languages.text: {n}Несмотря на то, что Хейнрикс почти не меняется в лице при словах Эмелины, Маражай резко склоняет голову и бросает на дознавателя голодный взгляд.{/n} "Ммм... и ужас, и отчаяние, и горечь... изысканная палитра, мон-кай..."

{n}Heinrix's expression scarcely wavers at Emelina's words, but despite this, Marazhai ducks his head sharply and watches the Interrogator with devouring eyes.{/n} "Mmm... fear, and despair, and sorrow... an exquisite palette, mon-keigh..."
languages.original_text: {n}Несмотря на то, что Хейнрикс почти не меняется в лице при словах Эмелины, Маражай резко склоняет голову и бросает на дознавателя голодный взгляд.{/n} "Ммм... и ужас, и отчаяние, и горечь... изысканная палитра, мон-кай..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix's expression scarcely wavers at Emelina's words, but despite this, Marazhai ducks his head sharply and watches the Interrogator with devouring eyes.{/n} "Mmm... fear, and despair, and sorrow... an exquisite palette, mon-keigh..."

traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}听到艾米莉娜的话之后，海因里希的表情几乎没有任何变化。但即便如此，玛拉斋依然猛地低下了头，注视着海因里希，仿佛要吃掉他一般。{/n}“嗯……恐惧、绝望与悲伤……多么精妙的色调啊，猴子……”
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix's expression scarcely wavers at Emelina's words, but despite this, Marazhai ducks his head sharply and watches the Interrogator with devouring eyes.{/n} "Mmm... fear, and despair, and sorrow... an exquisite palette, mon-keigh..."

traits.locale_text: {n}听到艾米莉娜的话之后，海因里希的表情几乎没有任何变化。但即便如此，玛拉斋依然猛地低下了头，注视着海因里希，仿佛要吃掉他一般。{/n}“嗯……恐惧、绝望与悲伤……多么精妙的色调啊，猴子……”
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}La expresión de Heinrix apenas cambia ante las palabras de Emelina, pero, aun así, Marazhai agacha la cabeza repentinamente y observa al interrogador con ojos hambrientos.{/n} «Mmm... miedo, desesperación, pena... una paleta exquisita, mon-keigh...».
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix's expression scarcely wavers at Emelina's words, but despite this, Marazhai ducks his head sharply and watches the Interrogator with devouring eyes.{/n} "Mmm... fear, and despair, and sorrow... an exquisite palette, mon-keigh..."

traits.locale_text: {n}La expresión de Heinrix apenas cambia ante las palabras de Emelina, pero, aun así, Marazhai agacha la cabeza repentinamente y observa al interrogador con ojos hambrientos.{/n} «Mmm... miedo, desesperación, pena... una paleta exquisita, mon-keigh...».
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}エメリナの言葉にハインリックスの表情はほとんど変わらなかったが、それにもかかわらず、マラズハイは鋭く頭を下げ、食い入るような目でインテロゲイターを見つめた。{/n}「うーん…恐怖と絶望と悲しみと……絶妙なパレットだな、モン＝ケイ…」
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix's expression scarcely wavers at Emelina's words, but despite this, Marazhai ducks his head sharply and watches the Interrogator with devouring eyes.{/n} "Mmm... fear, and despair, and sorrow... an exquisite palette, mon-keigh..."

traits.locale_text: {n}エメリナの言葉にハインリックスの表情はほとんど変わらなかったが、それにもかかわらず、マラズハイは鋭く頭を下げ、食い入るような目でインテロゲイターを見つめた。{/n}「うーん…恐怖と絶望と悲しみと……絶妙なパレットだな、モン＝ケイ…」
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Bien que la réaction d'Heinrix aux propos d'Emelina soit à peine perceptible, Marazhai tourne brusquement la tête et pose ses yeux avides sur l'interrogateur.{/n} « Mmm... Peur, désespoir et tristesse... Un mélange exquis, mon-keigh... »
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix's expression scarcely wavers at Emelina's words, but despite this, Marazhai ducks his head sharply and watches the Interrogator with devouring eyes.{/n} "Mmm... fear, and despair, and sorrow... an exquisite palette, mon-keigh..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Bien que la réaction d'Heinrix aux propos d'Emelina soit à peine perceptible, Marazhai tourne brusquement la tête et pose ses yeux avides sur l'interrogateur.{/n} « Mmm... Peur, désespoir et tristesse... Un mélange exquis, mon-keigh... »
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix' Gesichtsausdruck verändert sich bei Emelinas Worten kaum, aber dennoch zieht Marazhai seinen Kopf ein und beobachtet den Interrogator mit hungrigen Augen.{/n} "Mmm ... Angst und Verzweiflung und Traurigkeit ... eine exquisite Palette, Chem-Pan-Sey ..."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix's expression scarcely wavers at Emelina's words, but despite this, Marazhai ducks his head sharply and watches the Interrogator with devouring eyes.{/n} "Mmm... fear, and despair, and sorrow... an exquisite palette, mon-keigh..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix' Gesichtsausdruck verändert sich bei Emelinas Worten kaum, aber dennoch zieht Marazhai seinen Kopf ein und beobachtet den Interrogator mit hungrigen Augen.{/n} "Mmm ... Angst und Verzweiflung und Traurigkeit ... eine exquisite Palette, Chem-Pan-Sey ..."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix'in yüz ifadesi, Emelina'nın sözleri karşısında pek değişmiyor. Buna rağmen Marazhai, başını keskin bir hareketle eğip tüketen gözlerle Sorgucu'yu seyrediyor.{/n} "Hımm. Korku, umutsuzluk ve üzüntü. Enfes bir palet mon-keigh."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix's expression scarcely wavers at Emelina's words, but despite this, Marazhai ducks his head sharply and watches the Interrogator with devouring eyes.{/n} "Mmm... fear, and despair, and sorrow... an exquisite palette, mon-keigh..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix'in yüz ifadesi, Emelina'nın sözleri karşısında çok hafif değişiyor ancak buna rağmen Marazhai başını keskin bir hareketle eğiyor ve Sorgucu'yu, tüketen gözlerle seyrediyor.{/n} "Hımm. Korku ve umutsuzluk ve üzüntü. Enfes bir palet mon-keigh."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion
